sn10.10:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10.10:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako sukkāya bhikkhuniyā bhojanaṃ adāsi.
sn10.10:4.3: Atha kho sukkāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn10.10:5.4: Sabbaganthehi vippamuttiyā”ti.
